rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature or Shrine you control gains first strike until end of turn. If you control three or more Shrines, it gains double strike until end of turn instead.
notes: reworked: Was {2}{R/W}{R/W} with ’At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 0/0 white Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. If you control three or more Shrines, instead create that token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.’
